caption.p: Spatiotemporal changes in the lengths of the sowing-emergence ( a), emergence-squaring ( b), squaring-flowering ( c), flowering-boll opening ( d), and boll opening-harvest ( e) periods and the whole growing period ( f) of cotton across the North China Plain from 1981 to 2012. Green and red circles represent the trends of the lengths of phenological periods. Black pentagrams represent the trends at the stations, with a significance level of 0.05. Maps were generated using ArcGIS 10.1 (ESRI Inc, Redlands, CA, USA, http://www.esri.com/).
